title: Body Copy to Accompany Stratum 1
content:
I recently upgraded my personal brand with Stratum 1 to compliment my [wordmark](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019055522/http:/i50.tinypic.com/1r5bg1.jpg), but I am not really happy with it at small sizes as a body copy typeface.

If nothing comes to mind right away, another alternative I would be interested in pursuing is a typeface from FontFont that is a good match for my wordmark as well as works in both large and small sizes.

Thank you.

- corey
author: iamcorey

comments.content: Try Foundry Gridnik from the foundrytypes.co.uk
